title: Unspecified Error Occured: Please Check The Logs
body:
I have a tablet/computer that I have been trying to download league on, because I've seen it done on devices like mine. I'm not very good with computers but while downloading league for the first time around 30-40% (Usually 33% but sometimes it gets higher.) A window pops up saying Update Failed: Unspecified error occurred, please check the logs for more information. I'm not sure if its just the device that I'm using or the problem is caused by something else but I really want to fix it. I have tried restarting and running the launcher as admin, but it hasn't helped. Help would be greatly appreciated.

Device Specifications:
Model: CMP801SP-OD
CPU Processing Speed: 1.83GHz Quad-Core Intel Atom Processor
Operating System: Windows 10
Memory/ROM: 16GB Flash memory (formatted capacity will be less)
Memory/RAM DDR III: 1GB

Recent Log:
[redacted - please use a third party site like http://www.pastebin.com to paste and share you logs with instead of pasting them directly on boards. Thank you!]

replies.body:
This error at this particular spot in patching usually indicates that your connection to the patching servers is unstable and is causing the patcher to drop off entirely. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common network misconfigurations that cause this issue to pop up.

Please let me know if those steps caused any noticeable change for you.
